Room.Name: Overland Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Overland Drive, through the Farmer's Residences.
Room.LongDescription: Understanding the need for the farmers of the lands to have a private residence just like everyone else in town, a small community has been set up on both sides of Overland Drive for them. The community is rather small, but is close to the farming areas and relatively inexpensive to maintain.
